name: DPS
title: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
description: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable.
keyFeatures: Tenor option: 100 days or 500 days
Minimum Amount: BDT 50,000/-
Auto-renewal facility [with or without interest amount]
Higher interest rate (0.10%) for senior citizen(s) & female client (if apply singly)
speacialNote: Rates are the same for both individuals & institutions (except banks and FIs)
For individual accounts, female clients (If an account is opened singly) will avail 0.10% higher interest rate on Regular Term Deposits, Regular Earner Products & Interest First Deposits.
Senior citizens (Aged 59 and above) will avail 0.10% higher interest rate on Regular Term Deposits, Regular Earner Products & Interest First Deposit.
